title: can i rioter give me info on why my friend was banned?
body:
either he isnt telling me or something, he is a honest person and i would really like to know the reason he got perm banned, he had no previous bans so it is a little wierd that his account was permed. PLZ HELP

his account is ThompsonG

replies.body:
Riot will never give info about someone else's account, but your friend is welcome to submit a ticket questioning the reason. Given the timing it's likely it's a third party ban since a wave just went out. 3rd party/scripting bans are instant permas, so ban history is irrelevant.

Assuming he didn't use the scripts himself, the most likely scenarios are account sharing, boosting, or compromise. If his account was compromised he'll get it back once he goes through the support process and secures the account since this is a first time. If it's account sharing or boosting, sorry but that's on him and he won't be getting the account back.

Riot wont tell you why he was banned. 

He has to open a ticket himself or check his emails to verify the reason.
